call.game.state

Class StateEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • call.game.state.StateEngine

  • public class StateEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    A state system for managing states and passing inner-state data
    Author:
    Callum

      StateEngine()

      void addState(java.lang.Class<?> state)
      Add's a state to the engine

      Get the current state instance

      Call's the render method of the current state (if there is one)

      Sets the current state with no inner-state data

      Sets the current state with inner-state data

      • addState

        public void addState(java.lang.Class<?> state)
        Add's a state to the engine
        Parameters:
        state - The class of the state to be added

      • setState

        public void setState(int i)
        Sets the current state with no inner-state data
        Parameters:
        i - The id number of the state

      • setState

        public void setState(int i,
            StateInfo data)
        Sets the current state with inner-state data
        Parameters:
        i - The id number of the state
        data - The inner-state data or null

      • getState

        public java.lang.Object getState()
        Get the current state instance
